content:
Hi,

I have a funded PhD position that fits probably the best a student with a BSc or MSc in mathematics or computer science with an interest in pure mathematics, biology and programming.

The advert can be found on FindaPhD.com:
Algebraic Modelling of Molecular Interactions in Biological Cells at Edinburgh Napier University on FindAPhD.com
PhD Project - Algebraic Modelling of Molecular Interactions in Biological Cells at Edinburgh Napier University, listed on FindAPhD.com
www.findaphd.com

Please pass on this information to students who might be interested or colleagues who might know such students. The position can start in September 2023 or March 2023 (if the student has already graduated).

Best,
Peter

Professor Peter Andras
Dean
School of Computing, Engineering & the Built Environment
Edinburgh Napier University
Merchiston Campus Room C75
10 Colinton Road
Edinburgh
EH10 5DT
UK
